item.title: 200k to whoever that helps me ASAP
item.dc:creator: @s0rry_lumby5 s0rry lumby5
item.description:
@s0rry_lumby5 wrote:

ive been attempting to put a cmd list in the quests menu so you can just click them to tele and other cmds

ive put the line in the quest menu but im not quite sure what to do in the cases. i made one in reference to the emotes but i get errors. can anyone help me with this?

heres what i put in the cases:

case 7333: // Lumby Tele - Cmd List
if(Quests == 0) {
	//if(teleblock == false && tbed == 0) {//Lumby Tele
	if(teleblocked == 0 && tbed == 0) {
		teleportToX = 3225;
		teleportToY = 3219;
		heightLevel = 0;
		sendMessage("Welcome Home!");
		}

	//if(teleblock == true || tbed == 1) {
	if(teleblocked >= 1 || tbed == 1) {
		sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
		}
	}
	break;

also how would i change a whole server to a safe zone and just add pk zones

Read full topic
